text.value:
UPDATE ExportTableList_3
SET EXPORT_DATE = CAST(GETUTCDATE() AS DATE),
    Export_Status = 'SUCCESS'
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}';

UPDATE ExportTableList_3
SET EXPORT_DATE = CAST(GETUTCDATE() AS DATE),
    Export_Status = 'Failed'
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}';

INSERT INTO PIPELINE_LOG (PipelineName, ActivityName, TableName, FileName, FileType, Status)
VALUES (
    '@{pipeline().Pipeline}', 
    '@{activity('Copy Data1').activityType}', 
    '@{item().TableName}', 
    '@{item().FileName}', 
    '@{item().FileType}', 
    'SUCCESS'
);

message.value: @concat('file is not having more than 5',' rows')

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT LastWatermarkValue FROM ADF_Watermark WHERE TableName = 'EMP';

properties.description: To get only files ending with CSV
